text: Ta cong yigeren chuangzao nimen, ta shi na geren de pei'ou yu ta tonglei, yibian ta yilian ta. Ta he ta jiaojie hou, ta huaile yige qingpiaopiao de yun, ta neng zhaochang du ri, dang ta ganjue shenzi zhong de shihou, ta lia qidao zhenzhu ——ta lia de zhu——shuo:`Ruguo ni shangci women yige jianquan de erzi, women yiding ganxie ni.'
